alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:51AM CST until January 12 at 6:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CST FOR NORTHERN CHICOT...NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 551 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Benoit, or 10 miles south of Rosedale, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Beulah and Pace around 555 AM CST. Cleveland, Mound Bayou, Renova, Merigold, and Winstonville around 600 AM CST. Shelby around 605 AM CST. Duncan around 610 AM CST. Rome around 620 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
